name: SPACEPHOBIA - GMTK 2018
description:
[ Multi-directional shooter without forward movement ]

SPACEPHOBIA is a game made for the GMTK 2018 Game Jam. (48 hours Game Jam) 

  1. Do not exit from screen borders
  2.  Shoot and avoid asteroids 
  3. Pick up special items for extra points 
  4. Have Fun!
INPUT:KEYBOARDLEFT and RIGHT arrow keys ROTATE
SPACESHOOTESCPAUSE INPUT:CONTROLLERLEFT ANALOG STICKROTATEX (PS4) or A (XBOX) Button  *SHOOTSTART BUTTONPAUSE

(* Tested only with ps4 controller)
